body_text:
Bug 863246 just landed on Nightly, and it broke our ability to access vendor scripts from about:studies:
647 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/about-studies.css.
648 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/React.js.
649 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/ReactDOM.js.
650 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/PropTypes.js.
651 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/classnames.js.
652 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/common.js.
653 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/shield-studies.js.
654 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/about-studies.js.
655 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/about-studies.css.
656 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/React.js.
657 INFO Console message: [JavaScript Warning: "<script> source URI is not allowed in this document: â€œresource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/React.jsâ€�." {file: "about:studies" line: 15}]
658 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/ReactDOM.js.
659 INFO Console message: [JavaScript Warning: "<script> source URI is not allowed in this document: â€œresource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/ReactDOM.jsâ€�." {file: "about:studies" line: 16}]
660 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/PropTypes.js.
661 INFO Console message: [JavaScript Warning: "<script> source URI is not allowed in this document: â€œresource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/PropTypes.jsâ€�." {file: "about:studies" line: 17}]
662 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/classnames.js.
663 INFO Console message: [JavaScript Warning: "<script> source URI is not allowed in this document: â€œresource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/classnames.jsâ€�." {file: "about:studies" line: 18}]
664 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/common.js.
665 INFO Console message: [JavaScript Warning: "<script> source URI is not allowed in this document: â€œresource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/common.jsâ€�." {file: "about:studies" line: 19}]
666 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/shield-studies.js.
667 INFO Console message: [JavaScript Warning: "<script> source URI is not allowed in this document: â€œresource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/shield-studies.jsâ€�." {file: "about:studies" line: 20}]
668 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/about-studies.js.
669 INFO Console message: [JavaScript Warning: "<script> source URI is not allowed in this document: â€œresource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/about-studies.jsâ€�." {file: "about:studies" line: 21}]

We should be able to fix it by adding the contentaccessble=yes flag to jar.mn (example for the vendor bundle.

title: about:studies cannot access vendor scripts
body:
[Bug 863246](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=863246) just landed on Nightly, and it broke our ability to access vendor scripts from about:studies:

```
647 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/about-studies.css.
648 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/React.js.
649 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/ReactDOM.js.
650 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/PropTypes.js.
651 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/classnames.js.
652 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/common.js.
653 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/shield-studies.js.
654 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/about-studies.js.
655 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/about-studies.css.
656 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/React.js.
657 INFO Console message: [JavaScript Warning: "<script> source URI is not allowed in this document: â€œresource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/React.jsâ€." {file: "about:studies" line: 15}]
658 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/ReactDOM.js.
659 INFO Console message: [JavaScript Warning: "<script> source URI is not allowed in this document: â€œresource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/ReactDOM.jsâ€." {file: "about:studies" line: 16}]
660 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/PropTypes.js.
661 INFO Console message: [JavaScript Warning: "<script> source URI is not allowed in this document: â€œresource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/PropTypes.jsâ€." {file: "about:studies" line: 17}]
662 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/classnames.js.
663 INFO Console message: [JavaScript Warning: "<script> source URI is not allowed in this document: â€œresource://shield-recipe-client-vendor/classnames.jsâ€." {file: "about:studies" line: 18}]
664 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/common.js.
665 INFO Console message: [JavaScript Warning: "<script> source URI is not allowed in this document: â€œresource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/common.jsâ€." {file: "about:studies" line: 19}]
666 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/shield-studies.js.
667 INFO Console message: [JavaScript Warning: "<script> source URI is not allowed in this document: â€œresource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/shield-studies.jsâ€." {file: "about:studies" line: 20}]
668 INFO Console message: Security Error: Content at about:studies may not load or link to resource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/about-studies.js.
669 INFO Console message: [JavaScript Warning: "<script> source URI is not allowed in this document: â€œresource://shield-recipe-client-content/about-studies/about-studies.jsâ€." {file: "about:studies" line: 21}]
```

We should be able to fix it by adding the `contentaccessble=yes` flag to `jar.mn` ([example](http://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/rev/51b3d67a5ec1758bd2fe7d7b6e75ad6b6b5da223/browser/extensions/onboarding/jar.mn#8) for the vendor bundle.
